alert.note: Alert for Cass (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:50PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cass County through 715 PM CDT... At 649 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atlantic, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Cass County, including the following locations... Wiota, Lake Anita State Park, Anita Municipal Airport and Anita. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 61 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
